content: Does a script always pop up after clicking something like answering machine or NO to volunteering? I’m trying not to mess up and getting familiar with the system. Thank you!
You can preview the script outside of a "real" call and choose each option to understand the flow.
On the first screen, choose "Preview script" to move to the next step. Choose answers to view the next step or use the "Back" hyperlink (not the back button in your browser) to go back a step.
Yes, the script will always advance to the next page when you click on one of the button choices.
Thank you so much for your answers! On my next volunteer shift I’ll click on everything before I begin calls.
